page.title: 18BUILDINGS-CHANGE OF USE
page.content: At the top of Nevilles Cross bank there was an old Methodist chapel. Next door to the Chapel was a Co-op. store ,butit was closed down a long time ago.Both of these buildings have now been demolished and an extension to the laundry has been built. Next to Millburngate Bridge a new { {Shopping Precinct}is being built.The firm building on the site is called "John "Laing".Before it was a precinct it was a car park.While it was a car park some excavators unearthed some Saxon remains. St.Margarets hospital used to be a workhouse for poor people, now it is a hospital for old people.
